nodes.text: The Aurodium Spoon was a place located in the city of Lola Curich on the planet Lianna. In existence by the year 67 BBY, the Aurodium Spoon was placed in a public square full of boutique shops and restaurants, with a pedestrian tunnel opening onto one side of the square. In 67 BBY, Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Plagueis and his medical droid 11-4D pursued a shapeshifting Shi'ido in the square in which the Aurodium Spoon resided. However, by changing to the form of a humanoid Askajian, the Shi'ido eluded the pair until Plagueis directed his droid's attention to the Askajian currently passing by the Aurodium Spoon. In the end, the pair captured the Shi'ido.
The Aurodium Spoon appears in the 2012 novel Darth Plagueis, written by James Luceno.
